trans-unit.source: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性應該報告的類型描述元，特別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to specify the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別用來指定的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This filter mechanism is only implemented by the custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> for <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 這個篩選機制是只藉由自訂<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor><xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Invalid and Valid are relevant only for attached properties.
trans-unit.target: 無效和有效值只會用於附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The validity of a property is determined by working with the following attributes: <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute> , <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> which define the intended scope of the attached property in the object tree once the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的有效性取決於使用下列屬性︰ <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute>， <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>，<xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute>來定義想要附加的屬性範圍的物件樹中一次[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入。</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Designer applications that populate property grids and include attached properties in the grid must examine the value or presence of these attributes and the relative position of the current element versus either a parent or child element that "owns" the attached property.
trans-unit.target: 填入屬性方格和包含附加的屬性方格中的設計工具應用程式必須檢查的值存在這些屬性和目前的項目與 「 擁有 」 附加的屬性的父和子元素的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: The owner-setter relationship together with the attribute values and PropertyFilterOptions will define whether a given attached property that is set on an element is valid or invalid.
trans-unit.target: 擁有者 setter 關聯性，以及屬性值和 PropertyFilterOptions 會定義設定項目指定附加的屬性是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Return all properties.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Return only those properties that are not valid given the current context of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之物件的目前內容只有在不是有效的屬性。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Return no properties
trans-unit.target: 不傳回任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Return only those properties that have local values currently set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回只在具有目前設定的區域數值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Return only those properties whose local values are not set, or do not have properties set in an external expression store (such as binding or deferred resource).
trans-unit.target: 傳回只有這些屬性的區域數值未設定，或沒有屬性設定外部運算式存放區中 （例如繫結或延後資源）。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Return any property that is valid on the object in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在目前範圍中的物件有效的任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
